channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat Data Grid 8.4.4
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat Data Grid 8.4.4

item.title: CVE-2023-5236|2024-08-27T15:51:36.364Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20data%20grid%208.4.4
item.description: A flaw was found in Infinispan, which does not detect circular object references when unmarshalling. An authenticated attacker with sufficient permissions could insert a maliciously constructed object into the cache and use it to cause out of memory errors and achieve a denial of service.
